title: Thunderbird pages jump
content:
I asked this question quite awhile ago, but never got an answer. I'm trying again.

When I delete an email, rather than the highlighted bar going to the next email below, it jumps to the next page. Why?
creator: gleime

title: Contribution already made but still getting request for donations
content: Hello, My wife and I mailed a check to MZLA Technologies Corp on September 14, 2023, but we are still getting requests to donate. Was the check received? Thank you, Roland Liu roland.liu@verizon.net
creator: roland.liu

title: Can't Download Email from Microsoft 365 using Thunderbird 115.3.3
content:
About 2 weeks ago, (10/17/2023) release 115.3.3 was applied to my Thunderbird application. I can no longer download email from my Godaddy Microsoft 365 account. I use POP. Prior to the new release it worked fine. SMPT still works.

Are there setting changes I need to make with this release?

Thanks,

Randy
creator: randy68
